Polygon Lays Out Grand Plan To Connect Independent Layer-2 Networks On Ethereum
entry.summary:
Polygon, an Ethereum sidechain, has announced plans to build Polygon 2.0, a network based on zero-knowledge-powered layer-2 solutions, per an update on June 12. While this platform could boost liquidity, it hasn‚Äôt helped MATIC prices. The coin is at around 2023 lows after cracks emerged on June 5.
What Is Polygon 2.0?
Polygon‚Äôs official statement reads, ‚ÄúPolygon 2.0 is a network of ZK-powered layer-2 chains unified via a novel cross-chain coordination protocol. The entire network will feel like using a single chain for a user.‚Äù
The primary objective behind building Polygon 2.0 is to enable secure and instantaneous cross-chain interoperability among off-chain networks, most of which are built on Ethereum, the world‚Äôs largest smart contract platform.

entry.title: NFTs and CFDs: Understanding the Potential Synergy
entry.summary: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) and Contract for Difference (CFDs) are two financial products that have attracted a lot of attention recently in the digital arena. While CFDs enable traders to speculate on price changes without owning the underlying asset, NFTs represent distinctive digital assets. Although NFTs and CFDs may initially appear to have nothing in common, there is actually room for synergy between these two instruments. We will examine the interaction between NFTs and CFDs in this article, highlighting their distinctive qualities and talking about how their convergence can open up new possibilities in the digital economy. entry.title: Ripple CLO Demands Answers From SEC Over Hinman Speech Controversy
entry.summary:
Five years after Bill Hinman delivered his speech on cryptocurrencies, Chief Legal Officer (CLO) at Ripple, Stuart Alderoty, has called for an investigation into the former Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) official‚Äôs actions.¬†
The call comes after the SEC‚Äôs lawsuit against Ripple and the subsequent release of public emails and drafts of Hinman‚Äôs speech, which allegedly show that he ignored multiple warnings that his analysis had no basis in law and would create confusion in the market.
Ripple Calls For Transparency
In his speech, Hinman declared that a token is not a security once it becomes ‚Äúsufficiently decentralized‚Äù and invented factors to consider when making a ‚Äúsufficiently decentralized‚Äù determination. Despite claiming that the speech was his personal view, the SEC t‚Ä¶

entry.title: New Study Highlights Bitmain‚Äôs S19 Mining Rigs Dominate Bitcoin Network‚Äôs Hashrate
entry.summary:
Coin Metrics researchers published a groundbreaking study on June 13, unveiling an innovative nonce analysis methodology for bitcoin mining. This research enables experts to dissect and identify the specific mining rigs responsible for contributing hashrate to the network, while also evaluating the energy consumption and effectiveness of these machines. Intriguingly, the data reveals that Bitmain has exerted its dominance over the industry for an extended period, with three primary Antminer models now commanding the majority of today‚Äôs hashrate.
Groundbreaking Methodology Shows Researchers Can Dissect and Identify Miner Type, Energy Usage, E-Waste, and Efficiency

entry.summary:

These remuneration practices have drawn scrutiny and triggered discussions about the organization‚Äôs alignment with the interests of its community members.
The controversy arose after an organizational chart was shared on Twitter by the ApeCoin DAO secretary, known as ‚ÄúVulkan‚Äù. The chart revealed the salaries of the DAO‚Äôs leadership.

entry.title: Is The Cardano Bottom In? Here‚Äôs What On-Chain Data Suggests
entry.summary:
Cardano has observed some rise since hitting a low around the $0.23 level following the FTX collapse. However, here‚Äôs what on-chain data say about whether that was the bottom or not.
Three Cardano Indicators Shot Up During Local Bottom Formation
According to data from the on-chain analytics firm Santiment, three ADA metrics had surged to the highest level for 2023 when the price hit the $0.23 low. The first of these metrics is the ‚Äútrading volume,‚Äù which measures the total amount of Cardano that‚Äôs being moved around on the blockchain every day by the users.
When the value of this metric goes up, it means that a large number of tokens of the asset are being transacted on the network right now. Such a trend can be a sign that traders are active in the sector currently.

entry.title: Decentralized Social Networking App Damus Set To Be Removed From Apple's App Store
entry.summary: In a surprising turn of events, Damus, the popular decentralized social networking app built on Nostr, is facing removal from Apple's App Store. Apple claims that Damus violates their guidelines by allowing users to send "tips" (zaps) associated with receiving content from digital content creators through a mechanism other than in-app purchase. This violation of Guideline 3.1.1 - Business - Payments - In-App Purchase has prompted Apple to take action, according to the message sent to Damus creator William Casarin. The news comes at a critical time for Damus and its creator, who was set to give a talk at the Oslo Freedom Forum on how decentralized social networks, integrated with lightning technology, can bring financial freedom to the masses. The impending removal from the App Store raises‚Ä¶

entry.title: Sturdy Finance Offers $100,000 Bounty To Attacker Who Wiped Out 442 ETH
entry.summary:
Decentralized lending platform Sturdy Finance has declared a $100,000 bounty for the hacker who stole 442 ETH from the protocol. The lending protocol promised to let the matter slide if the hacker agreed to return the stolen funds and take the bounty.
This development comes after a hacker looted 442 ETH worth nearly $800,000 after exploiting an Oracle price discrepancy on the protocol on June 12.¬†Blockchain security platform PeckShield had alerted Sturdy Finance after spotting the questionable transaction.
The Hack Bounty Offer: Sturdy Willing To Backdown If Hacker Surrenders Stolen Funds

entry.summary: The Sandbox COO Sebastien Borget told Decrypt at this year‚Äôs NFC Lisbon that despite the high price point, Apple‚Äôs new VR headset is nonetheless ‚Äúgroundbreaking.‚Äù And though the tech giant never used the term ‚Äúmetaverse‚Äù in its reveal, Borget is sure that the technology will be key in growing participation in various digital worlds.

entry.title: Is Gala Safe? Gala Games Head of Blockchain on GALA, Crypto, and SEC Regulatory Turmoil
entry.summary: Gala Games President of Blockchain shares his thoughts on the GALA token upgrade and the latest SEC turmoil with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Artists Adopting NFTs Has Been ‚ÄòReally Market Dependent‚Äô, Says NFT Club Berlin‚Äôs Rebekka Revel
entry.summary: Getting non-crypto artists to make the leap into Web3 comes in ebbs and flows according to the market‚Äôs bear and bull waves, says co-founder of NFT Club Berlin and Superteam Germany Rebekka Revel. But she‚Äôs hoping to change that by changing the narrative around digital collectibles, regardless of the market, one word at a time.

entry.title: Big Brands Exploring Web3 to ‚ÄòScale Up Their Superfan Base‚Äô: SuperDuper Co-founder
entry.summary: Co-founder and co-CEO of Web3 media brand SuperDuper Dom Smith says big brands are eager to enter the space‚Äîthey just don‚Äôt know how. Still, they all maintain a thesis of turning their communities into ‚Äúsuper fans‚Äù that generate value for users as well as a firm‚Äôs bottom line.

entry.title: How 1 Simple Question Kickstarted Performance Artist Foodmasku's Plunge Into NFTs
entry.summary: As his food mask creations went viral on the Internet during the COVID lockdowns, reposted on TikTok and Instagram without his consent, he soon asked: "How do I protect my digital files?" Performance artist Foodmasku describes at this year's NFC Lisbon how that simple question spiraled into a minting collection after collection of his edible works.

entry.title: Arianee CEO Pegs Wine and Spirits as Next 'Exciting' Industry to Make Web3 Leap
entry.summary: CEO and co-founder of Arianee Pierre Nicolas Hurstel unpacks the wide spectrum of digital collectibles from 10,000 PFP collections to access passes for exclusive events. And with an unannounced big brand soon joining, Hurstel revealed at NFC Lisbon which kind of NFTs big brands are moving towards.

entry.title: Why 'Words With Friends' Creator Paul Bettner is 'Allergic' to Pay-to-Win NFTs
entry.summary: Words With Friends and Wildcard creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on what to do when NFTs become in-game characters and assets.

entry.title: Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan: 18 Months is 'Several Decades' in Crypto
entry.summary: Fractal and Twitch co-founder Justin Kan gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin an update on all things Fractal and his perspective on blockchain technology in gaming.

entry.title: Playing for Money in Web3 Games Not 'Durable,' Says Fractal's Justin Kan
entry.summary: Twitch and Fractal co-founder Justin Kan and Fractal co-founder Dan Borstelmann share their perspectives on Web3 gaming's changing landscape with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: From Cyber Cafe to Web3: How Everquest Dev Jeffrey Butler Got Into Game Development
entry.summary: Everquest developer turned Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he got into game development.

entry.title: The Machines Arena Game Preview: Is This the Next Overwatch?
entry.summary: Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin shares an inside look at The Machines Arena, an upcoming top-down 4v4 shooter from Directive Games that will offer NFTs minted on Ethereum sidechain network Ronin.

entry.title: You 'Have' to Be on Mobile: InfiniGods Cofounders on Gaming
entry.summary: InfiniGods developers Damon Gura and Owen O‚ÄôDonoghue share their stance on why mobile gaming is essential to Web3 adoption and general success in the video games industry.

entry.title: Crypto Chaos of 2022 'Didn't Damage Technology Underlying the Industry': X Ventures Co-Founder Matthias Reiser
entry.summary: Ahead of this month's Proof of Talk event in Paris on June 14 and June 15, X Ventures co-founder and the event's co-organizer Dr. Matthias Reiser said nothing's changed for those with a "long-term view" of the industry. Still, events like the collapse of Terra and FTX in 20222 have certainly damaged investors' trust in crypto.
